reviews.review_text: It's really a good app. Good efforts from the team and they help whenever you contact. Those who are disappointed or have problems with the app should just learn how to use technology first lmao. Amazing work people!â™¥ï¸ğŸŒ¹

Initially, I couldn't find information on conditions like ulcerative colitis or Crohn's disease in the app. However, the team reached out, quickly resolved the issue, and improved the experience. I'm impressed by their responsiveness and dedication to user feedback. Great work and looking forward to future updates! , keep up the good work ğŸ’ª
great app but colors are too bright the UI is clean but being minimalistic would be better, also adding the unit price in drug info will be great keep the good work
really good app. it helped me a lot especially I'm in Saudi Arabia and i had some difficulties with other apps
useful app easy interface updated information highly recommended.
helpful app as a start of being doctor
In the next few years, this application will be the leading app in egypt
